Line3.6D03F: Knowledge of their craft has spread to others, but most rogues you see these days are not true members of the order.
Line5.6D03F: Not sure how they lost hold of it, but I’ve heard the Sisters are not as strong as they once were.
Line1.6D03F: It's a relic from when the world was young. For many years, an order of rogues called the Sisters of the Sightless Eye kept it safe.
MenuLabel: “Where did the Sightless Eye come from?”
